docs.text: Welcome to Kubernetes Community Days Amsterdam 2022 website This site is the reference for the community and the organizing team. The official website is on community.cncf.io . Meetings Minutes of the bi-weekly meetings are stored publicly in Google Docs and the recordings are in our Youtube playlist . We meet every other Thursday at 6pm CEST. This is the zoom link to join and discuss (passcode 429864) Call for volunteers Join our team! Come to one of the office hours calls, introduce yourself and start picking out tasks from the public project board . Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
